reviews.review_msg: Nilsson has the uncanny ability to take any interpretation and/or suggestions thrown at him, and not only run with it, but back it up with secondary sources off the top of his head. Excellent prof, hope he gets tenured.

While I do agree that Susan does not answer emails (and that gets very frusterating) I am confused as to what textbook the previous person was referring to, as we only read books and read them all. Susan is wonderful, and yes, while a bit disorganized, totally worth overlooking that bad part and focusing on the amazing characteristics she has.

TOTALLY DISORGANIZED.Does NOT reply to student emails EVER.Had the class buy a $75 text book&used it 3xs.Made us print approx 2-10 pg.articles a week for the class at our own expense & would not email them until the PM before.She's nice & can  create great discussion/knows the information,but overall is a mess and needs to get her act together.

Definitely my favourite class this semester! She generates great discussions for the class which makes the two hours twice a week just fly by! Would recommend her to anyone! As long as you're a responsible student and actually do the reading you'll do great in this class. Anyone who doesn't like Susan obviously doesn't do the required readings. :)

Really great professor- funny, engaging, and very passionate about her subject. Without a doubt, my favourite class this semester- she really does well at generating great discussions.I can't wait to take her again.

Horrible prof. Lectures seem interesting at first, but as the time goes by they become repetative and boring.  Hard marker, doesn't give you enough feedback for your next essay.  Always late for class, and then keeps you in for 5 or 10 minutes after class ends.  I do not recommend her!!!
Tough marker. Lots of writing assignments in her class. But she's an excellent teacher and all her lectures are interesting. Learned a lot from her.

Nadine is awsome--her lectures and activities are relevant and thoughtful and she is a really kind and attractive person. It is too bad that the same person keeps giving her bad ratings. Seriously, get a life you loser. Don't you have anything better to do?

Nadine is an excellent prof. She's very helpful and encouraging, and her reading lists are wonderful. She sets a very comfortable, casual class environment and when you speak to her, its like talking to a peer instead of a prof.

I thought Professor Ogden was well-read, interesting, and very helpful. I would take another course with him. I wasn't a big fan of the fact that during tutorials he made us separate in groups for half an hour and discuss our texts without him.
